name: Maelstrom
description: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.

abilities.name: Chain Lightning
abilities.description: Grants the wielder's attacks a chance to pierce through evasion, and to release a bolt of electricity on the target, that leaps between other nearby targets, dealing magical damage to all of them.
notes: Chain Lightning can proc on invisible enemies, enemies in fog of war, and already dead enemies
Attacks which proc Chain Lightning cannot miss
Lightning bounces in 0.25-second intervals, hitting 4 targets takes 0.75 seconds
All bounces together can deal up to 440 damage (before reductions)
Against a lone target, Chain Lightning adds an average of 27.5 magical spell damage to every attack
Cannot bounce on enemies it has already bounced to, invisible enemies, enemies in fog of war, non-targetable enemies, ward-type units, or buildings
If the wielder dies, all ongoing Chain Lightning instances stop immediately
Cannot proc while the wielder is dead
Chain Lightning from Maelstrom-based items have no stacking priority; the oldest source within the inventory takes priority

additionalInfo: Maelstrom is a very good item for speeding up farming. If the extra experience is not needed, it is a good alternative to Hand of Midas
Great to deal with illusions or mass-summons like Broodmother's spiders, Nature's Prophet's treants, etc. Especially useful for ranged heroes that lack area damage
The Chain Lightning deals magical damage which ignores armor and Damage Block, making it good against heroes with Vanguard, Tidehunter with Kraken Shell, and heroes with high armor
Useful pickup against mega creeps to help clear waves
